TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AmbientPropertyValue extends System.Object

summary.span: 报告有关环境属性的信息，作为 实现的一部分。

span.span: Reports information about an ambient property, as part of an implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示通过调用返回的信息项服务方法。 represents an information item that is returned by calling an service method. `GetAll`方法返回枚举或数组项;`GetFirst`方法返回单个。The `GetAll` methods return enumerations or arrays of items; the `GetFirst` methods return a single . ## 有关环境属性About Ambient Properties 环境属性是其属性值应为 XAML 节点结构中的值转换器用法和其下的对象图可用属性。An ambient property is a property whose property value should be available to value converter usage in the XAML node structure and to the object graph underneath it. 在加载路径的对象写入阶段或保存的序列化阶段期间的环境概念是 XAML 处理器相关路径。The ambient concept is relevant for a XAML processor during the object-writing phase of the load path or the serialization phase of a save path. 一种类型还可能被由于环境。A type can also be attributed as ambient. 在这种情况下，使用特性化的类型的所有属性都报告为环境。In this case, all properties that use the attributed type are reported as ambient. 在加载路径的情况下，环境属性值可能会影响其下存在 XAML 节点结构中的其他属性的对象关系图生成值。In the load path case, the ambient property value might influence the object graph produced value of other properties that exist underneath it in a XAML node structure. 当处理为 XAML 节点流，环境的概念意味着环境属性值必须是可用于类型转换器和标记扩展`StartObject`到`EndObject`。When processed as a XAML node stream, the ambient concept implies that the ambient property value must be available to type converters and markup extensions from `StartObject` to `EndObject`. 同样，类型转换器或标记扩展使用该保存路径可以查找环境属性和它的值。Similarly, a type converter or markup extension that is used for the save path can look up the ambient property and its value. 因此，XAML 生成的是更好的往返过程表示形式。Therefore, the XAML that is produced is a better round-trip representation. 根据其语言定义，XAML 不会指定必须处理对象的成员的顺序。By its language definition, XAML does not specify the order in which members of an object must be processed. 但是，任何环境属性值都必须首先由 XAML 读取器处理，以便其他属性中包含的类型转换器和标记扩展用法可以访问通过服务。However, any ambient property value must be processed first by the XAML reader so that the type converter and markup extension usage that are contained in other properties can access it through the service. 是一个类似的概念，还会影响 XAML 节点处理顺序。 is a similar concept that also influences XAML node-processing order. 但是，仅用于对等成员和节点关系; 因此不可能影响所有后代。However, can only be used for peer member and node relationships; it cannot influence all descendants. 此外，直接影响对象关系图属性设置，而环境技术依赖于类型转换器或标记扩展。Also, directly influences object graph property setting, whereas the ambient technique relies on type converters or markup extensions. 在环境的技术，还必须有特定的类型转换器或标记扩展定义。In the ambient technique, there must also be a specific type converter or markup extension definition. 负责每个类型转换器或标记扩展，以确定应如何解释和应用于使用类型转换器或标记扩展的对象关系图位置的环境属性值。It is up to each type converter or markup extension to determine how the ambient property value should be interpreted and applied to the object graph location where the type converter or markup extension is used. ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 中所示的环境属性方案[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]功能集是，可以限定必要的属性名称查找有关其他值。An ambient property scenario that is illustrated in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] feature set is , which can qualify the necessary property name lookups for other values. 在这种情况下，值限定中下面的 XAML 节点的值。In this case, the value qualifies the values in the XAML nodes underneath it. 使用的类型转换器行为。 uses the type converter behavior for a . 此行为访问环境通过查询值从可用于类型转换器和标记扩展的服务上下文。This behavior accesses the ambient value by querying from a service context that is available to type converters and markup extensions.
